Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Trump invoked the Insurrection Act of 1807.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that Trump invoked the Insurrection Act.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the statement on the @TeamTrumpNews Parler account is authentic and represents the official position of the Trump team.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider alternative explanations for the statement, such as the possibility of an impostor account on Parler.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Insurrection Act was not invoked by Trump.
